bibl.note: This is a letter from George Stuart to his wife, Margaret, dated December 19, 1849. He writes that all is well, and actually going better than expected. He writes that he is travelling about 33 miles a day.

div.p: You will see by this that we are still making our 33 miles pr per day, should we continue through the remainder of the week to do so, we will be in the neighbourhood neighborhood of Sparta saturday evening___
Resting on Sunday, we would be in Nashville this day week, We have had less difficulty to encounter than I anticipated
